slides.title: Holiday Season

content.headline: The Busiest Shopping Season Is Almost Here
content.subhead: Make sure customers find YOU this holiday

slides.narration: Holiday season is almost here—the busiest shopping time of the year. Customers are actively looking for local businesses to support. The question is: will they find you? We've got special holiday opportunities to make sure they do.

slides.title: Holiday Opportunities

options.what: Featured in our curated local gift guide
options.reach: Sent to all subscribers + promoted socially

options.what: Free event posting for holiday events

slides.narration: Here are your holiday visibility options. Holiday Gift Guide: featured in our curated local gift guide sent to all subscribers. Holiday Event Listing: free posting for your holiday events with newsletter features. Small Business Saturday: featured participant listing with special coverage. Holiday Deals Section: your holiday offer prominently displayed in dedicated communications. Last-Minute Guide: featured in our last-minute shopping guide reaching high-intent shoppers.

slides.title: Holiday Timeline
slides.narration: Key dates to know. November first: Holiday Gift Guide submissions open. November fifteenth: Gift Guide is published. November twenty-eighth: Small Business Saturday with special features. December first through fifteenth: Holiday Deals promotion period. December sixteenth through twenty-third: Last-Minute Guide for procrastinators. Submit early for best placement—first submissions get priority positioning.

slides.title: Holiday Results

results.result: Gift card sales up 67% over previous year

slides.narration: What did participants experience last year? A gift shop in our Gift Guide and Deals section had their best December in seven years—up forty-three percent. A restaurant listing holiday events sold out four holiday dinner events. A spa in our Gift Guide saw gift card sales up sixty-seven percent over the previous year. This season brings customers looking to spend—make sure they find you.

slides.title: Get Started
slides.narration: Ready for the holidays? Submit for holiday features now—Gift Guide deadline is November tenth. Or see last year's guide to see what participants looked like. The holiday shopping season waits for no one. Get visible before customers start looking.
